extends java.lang.Object
    This is the Ride Controller, which is responsible for the Ride Requests Logic

      • createRideRequest

        public void createRideRequest(Location startLocation,
                              Location endLocation,
                              double cost,
                              java.lang.String rider)
        Creates a new Ride Request in Firestore
        Parameters:
        startLocation - The start location of the ride request
        endLocation - The end location of the ride request
        cost - The cost of the ride request
        rider - The UID of the Rider who requested the Ride Request

      • removeRideRequest

        public void removeRideRequest(RideRequest rideRequest)
        Cancels a Ride Request that the Rider just requested
        Parameters:
        rideRequest - The ride request to be cancelled and removed from Firestore

      • updateRideRequest

        public void updateRideRequest(RideRequest request)
        Updates a ride request with updated fields in the request
        Parameters:
        request - The ride request to be updated in Firestore

      • getPendingRideRequests

        Get all pending ride requests from Firestore
        Parameters:
        callback - The callback that will be returned to the activity

      • finishRideRequest

        public void finishRideRequest(User driver,
                              RideRequest rideRequest)
        Completes a ride request
        Parameters:
        driver - The driver that is completing the ride request
        rideRequest - The ride request to be completed

      • addListenerToRideRequest

        public void addListenerToRideRequest(java.util.Observer observer,
                                     java.lang.String requestId)
        Add an activity as an observer to updates to a ride request in Firestore
        Parameters:
        observer - An activity that will be listening to updates in Firestore
        requestId - The ID of the ride request that will be listened on

      • removeListeners

        public void removeListeners(java.util.Observer observer,
                            java.lang.String requestId)
        Removes all observers/listeners
        Parameters:
        observer - The observers to be removed
        requestId - The ID of the ride request to stop listening on
